sub_title: Tech lead and cross platform mobile application software developer specialising in payments, banking and security.
summary:
Experienced multi skilled technical expert, manager and product developer specialising in security, payments, cross platform, mobile applications and automation. International, creative, flexible, problem solver, designer, team player, communicator and coder.

I am an expert in the technical aspects of chip cards, mobile applications, security, frontends and backends, networks, system design and standards in the fields of payment systems. I am experienced with Mobile Wallets, Mobile Payments using NFC/USIM/HCE, EMV contact and contactless payments Card/POS/ATM, smart card and mobile devices, digital security, proximity BLE/Beacons, geolocation, and virtual currencies.
 
Some of my achievements include the first EMV cards in Sub Saharan Africa, Australia, Middle East (GCC) and Rwanda and evolving Mobile NFC Wallets through projects such as Vodafone Wallet (international), Sixpack (NL), WEVE (UK), and implementing the first NFC mobile credit payment application for ICS (NL)

My 15 years of experience helping banks and mobile networks implement complex payment technologies lead me to realize my knowledge is repetitive in nature and ready for automation. This eventually lead to the creation of ExpertBox.com, which makes knowledge automation accessible to all.

ExpertBox.com is a free knowledge automation platform enabling experts to automate, monetize and share their knowledge using simple drag and drop logic, real-time data and machine learning.

Keywords:  EMV, NFC, ISO14443, BLE, Embedded Security, Cryptography, Mobile Wallets, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Processing, Image Recognition, WebRTC, Knowledge Automation, Digital Constructs, Business Process Automation, Robotic Process Automation, Chatbots.

[{'company': {'id': 20106, 'name': 'International Card Services', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHhATt8hZ91Og/company-logo_400_400/0/1677567255650?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=gQzOtsC8xrn3BvJxExHHd_61ZQL0G2NCFo0HZD-QLEY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/internationalcardservices/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'International Card Services', 'description': 'I created the baseline Application Framework, Test Framework, and Build Scripts for the ICS White Label Banking application and functioned as technical lead in a highly efficient and capable, agile SCRUM team.

This application is compiled into 6 iOS and 6 Android Apps from a single unified code base, and each tenant application is configuration driven in terms of styling and features. This multi-language multi-tenant application is actively used by approximately 3 million users for Internet banking and payments.

With this team, we build an entire banking app from the ground up, including features including:
Identification using Selfies, Photos, and NFC; Activation and Strong Customer Authentication; Biometric Authentication; 3d Secure Transaction Approval; Online Login Approvals; Account Payments/Topup using IDeal; In-App PSD2 Authentication, Transaction Disputed and Remediation; Transaction and Account Overview; Transaction Search; Useage Analytics; HTTPs with Certificate Pinning, and Mobile Wallet In App Provisioning.

The application is highly secure and contains more than one million direct and indirect dependencies. Not only are Open Source components used, but we also created cross-platform plugins and native wrappers for two external proprietary native libraries on Android and iOS. 

In this project, I worked with the following toolset: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ReactWeb, Cordova, Wiremock, Storybook, Jest, Cypress, Appium, NodeJS, ShellJS, MaterialUI, i18n, Lokalize, Figma and Jira, to name but a few.', 'title': 'Lead Developer', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2887453, 'name': 'The Expert Box', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHF8M_7F98uTQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519894927815?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=C4grooPk9EoeRkza0DFz4Yb1J5RfwFbuT6x-iEa4GZY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-expert-box/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'The Expert Box', 'description': 'Product management, design and full stack software development of the knowledge automation platform ExpertBox.com. Utilising a cross-platform open-source JavaScript/ HTML5/SASS stack including Meteor, MongoDB, MaterializeCSS, Blaze and React. 

Custom functionality includes Automatic Web Form Components, Logic Flow Designer, Digital Constructs, Chatbots, Cloud Storage, WebRTC Video Conferencing, Micropayments, Artificial Intelligence Orchestration, Natural Language Processing, Image Recognition, Distributed Applications, and 3-factor Biometric OAUTH/OpenId user account security.', 'title': 'Chief Technology Officer (Owner)', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 17976189, 'name': 'Explicit Selection', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH_ECyRNEFlPA/company-logo_400_400/0/1587546425711?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=fGPewQEe5HNTpsjde7TExwISuIM4s_6yzdHcKSQlQHw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/explicitselection/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Explicit Selection', 'description': 'At Explicit Selection, we help our clients to navigate in the dynamic world of FinTech.
